description: You can't save your screenplay whatsoever. You can't save on desktop nor email it to yourself. Do not download, you'll lose all progress cause you cant save or export it anywhere

This is indeed a very feature rich environment. But there is one crucial flaw, which is i cannot locate where the files are being saved to. The directory it gives me doesn't not even exist on my computer, and i can't even change where the files are being saved.
